statements: SELECT * FROM SubscriberInformation;
SELECT id, name FROM SubscriberInformation;
SELECT name, address FROM SubscriberInformation WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM SubscriberInformation ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM SubscriberInformation WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberInformation WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT name, address FROM SubscriberInformation ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberInformation WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, address, subscription_status FROM SubscriberInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_status, COUNT(*) FROM SubscriberInformation GROUP BY subscription_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT id, name, address FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM subscribers JOIN subscriptions ON subscribers.id = subscriptions.subscriber_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, address FROM subscribers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT subscriber_id, name, address, subscription_status FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM subscription_payments;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT subscribers.name, subscriptions.start_date, subscription_payments.amount FROM subscribers JOIN subscriptions ON subscribers.subscriber_id = subscriptions.subscriber_id JOIN subscription_payments ON subscriptions.subscription_id = subscription_payments.subscription_id WHERE subscriptions.status = 'Active';

SELECT subscribers.name, subscriptions.start_date, subscription_payments.amount FROM subscribers JOIN subscriptions ON subscribers.subscriber_id = subscriptions.subscriber_id JOIN subscription_payments ON subscriptions.subscription_id = subscription_payments.subscription_id WHERE subscription_payments.amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY subscribers.name ASC, subscriptions.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT magazine_name, publication_frequency FROM magazines WHERE publication_frequency='Monthly';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE active_status=True;
SELECT subscriber_id, MAX(end_date) FROM subscriptions GROUP BY subscriber_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND active_status = true;
SELECT magazine_name, publication_frequency FROM magazines ORDER BY magazine_name DESC;
SELECT s.start_date, sh.action_date, sh.action_description FROM subscriptions s JOIN subscription_history sh ON s.subscription_id = sh.subscription_id WHERE s.active_status = false;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, name, address FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status='active';
SELECT name, price FROM magazines ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.name, m.name FROM subscribers s JOIN subscriber_magazines sm ON s.subscriber_id = sm.subscriber_id JOIN magazines m ON sm.magazine_id = m.magazine_id;
SELECT p.date, p.amount, s.name FROM payments p JOIN subscribers s ON p.subscriber_id = s.subscriber_id ORDER BY p.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT name, address FROM subscribers ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT s.name, m.name, p.amount FROM subscribers s JOIN payments p ON s.subscriber_id = p.subscriber_id JOIN magazines m ON m.magazine_id = (SELECT magazine_id FROM subscriber_magazines WHERE subscriber_id = s.subscriber_id);
SELECT s.name, COUNT(m.magazine_id) AS total_magazines FROM subscribers s JOIN subscriber_magazines m ON s.subscriber_id = m.subscriber_id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY total_magazines DESC;
SELECT s.name, SUM(p.amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM subscribers s JOIN payments p ON s.subscriber_id = p.subscriber_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING total_amount_paid > 100;
